name: CC SSL Client Socket
desc:
Network socket that allows encrypted connection and/or remote host verification.

Accepts inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "ssl.host": "example.com"} - Override the host configuration
    { "ssl.port": 1234} - Override the port configuration.
    { "ssl.verify_name": "some_name"} - Override the verify name configuration.
    { "network.host": "example.com"} - Alias to "ssl.host".
    { "network.port": 1234} - Alias to "ssl.port".
